text:
Catherine Simone Avnet Lazarus (April 26, 1976 – December 13, 2020) was an American writer, comedian, and talk show host. Lazarus was best known as creator and host of the "Employee of the Month", a monthly comedy show and podcast filmed live at Joe's Pub in New York City.
Lazarus died from breast cancer at her apartment in New York City on December 13, 2020, at age 44.
